City Council and Elections
==========================

City Council ChambersMeetings
-----------------------------

* 7:00 pm
* Second Monday of each month
* City Council Chambers  
  514 E. Brazos Avenue  
  West Columbia, TX 77486

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings.

[Agendas](https://westcolumbiatx.org/915)

Minutes are also available following approval.

[Minutes](https://westcolumbiatx.org/973/Council-Minutes)

Members
-------

* **Laurie B. Kincannon**[**Mayor**](https://westcolumbiatx.org/Directory.aspx?EID=2 "Mark Smith, Mayor")  
  Term Expires: May 2026
* **Robert L. Thomas, Council Pos. 1**  
  Term Expires: May 2025
* **Daniel Carreon, Council Pos. 2**  
  Term Expires: May 2026

* **Chris Gilbert, Council Pos. 3**  
  Term Expires: May 2025
* **Rory Burke, Council Pos. 4, Mayor Pro Tem**  
  Term Expires: May 2025
* **Lauren Raynes Buchanan, Council Pos. 5**  
  Term Expires: May 2026

Description
-----------

West Columbia is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the City of West Columbia. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the Governing Body. All Governing Body members serve two-year terms. The Governing Body, being the elected representative of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.
